channel.title: Menu Maker
channel.description:
I was extremely bored today, and had nothing better to do, so I thought I would make another batch file to help ppl out. I know that there are alot of Menu Makers out there, but I just made this one out of boredom, and fun. lol. Its pretty cool, if you want to use it, and please leave your comments here! Please do not flame me, as I did not have to post this, I just want to help people by using my specialty (coding batch) to create things that can help them with computer related stuff.
Download Links-
Rapid Share- http://rapidshare.com/files/61446211/Menu_Maker.zip
Uppit- http://uppit.com/d/3VS08
Credits- Me :p[br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2007, 05:25:49 PM[/size][hr]no replies?

item.title: Menu Maker
item.dc:creator: @Helbound Helbound
item.description:
@Helbound wrote:

ty silverlining. And the reason being that it is not a executable/jar file is that I do not know enough about VB/Delphi to make exe file that can do what the menu maker can, and for a jar file, I have can never find the right program to jar a java file, plus, coding it in java takes alot more time than it does for batch. And, like I said, I was bored.

Read full topic

Helbound didn’t have to post it, and it is a genuine, if not substantial, contribution, which many of you in this topic cannot honestly say you have made. I’ll be the first to say this, but thank you Helbound for, if anything, your spirit.

item.title: Menu Maker
item.dc:creator: @Helbound Helbound
item.description:
@Helbound wrote:

batch is coding. Its DOS command line syntax. How the hell is it in the wrong section? This section is for 3rd party programs, meaning programs that are not directly in the first person view. This forum allows you to post your coding, and that is what i did. Plus, moparisthebest.com doesnt allow you to post that. The download section is strictly for clients/sources, not server tools.

item.title: Menu Maker
item.dc:creator: @Helbound Helbound
item.description:
@Helbound wrote:

Copy Right 2007.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
::                                                              ::
:: All of the following code, and everything in folder          ::
::   Containing this file, and all other Menu maker,    	::
::           is © Copywrited 2007 by, 			        ::
::               WWWT Enterprises, Runix Enterprises, and       ::
:: Is under ownership of Helbound. This file can not be 	::
:: uploaded to any file server, or website, without permission  ::
:: from helbound. To obtain permission, email helbound at-	::
:: helboundz@yahoo.com						::
:: Thank You For Downloading Menu Maker, By Helbound		::  
::			All Rights Reserved.			::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
@echo off
:menu
cls
Title Menu Maker By Helbound
cls
echo Welcome to Helbound's menu maker!
echo The following is the current list of commands-
echo.
echo a - add a title to your menu.
echo add - add the text to your menu.
echo.
echo.
set /p n=Number- 
if %n%==a goto addtitle
if %n%==add goto linetxt
if %n%==* goto er
goto er
:addtitle
cls
title Add A Title
cls
echo Please type the title of the menu you wish to create.
echo Then Please Press Enter...
echo.
echo.
set /p title=Title- 
goto linetxt
:linetxt
cls
title Add Text
cls
echo Please type the first sentence of what you want to add
echo to your menu. Then Press Enter...
echo.
echo.
set /p txt1=Text- 
goto text2
:text2
cls
echo Please type the second sentence...
set /p txt2=Text- 
goto text3
:text3
cls
echo Please type the third sentence...
set /p txt3=Text- 
goto text4
:text4
cls
echo Please type the fourth sentence...
set /p txt4=Text- 
goto text5
:text5
cls
echo Please type the last sentence...
set /p txt5=Text- 
goto create
:er
cls
Title ERROR
cls
echo the command you typed is incorrect. Please re-type the command.
echo If you still have difficulty, please contact helbound at-
echo helboundz@yahoo.com
echo.
echo Ty,
echo Helbound.
echo helboundz@yahoo.com
pause
goto menu
:create
cls
Title Creating Menu...
cls
echo Now Creating menu...
echo public void %title%() //created with helbound's menu maker! >> "menu.txt"
echo { >> "menu.txt"
echo sendQuest("@blu@%title%", 8144); >> "menu.txt"
echo clearQuestInterface(); >> "menu.txt"
echo sendQuest("@dre@%txt1%", 8145) >> "menu.txt"
echo sendQuest("@dre@%txt2%", 8147); >> "menu.txt"
echo sendQuest("@dre@%txt3%", 8148); >> "menu.txt"
echo sendQuest("@dre@%txt4%", 8149); >> "menu.txt"
echo sendQuest("@dre@%txt5%", 8150); >> "menu.txt"
echo sendQuestSomething(8143); >> "menu.txt"
echo showInterface(8134); >> "menu.txt"
echo flushOutStream(); >> "menu.txt"
echo } >> "menu.txt"
echo. >> "menu.txt"
pause
goto menu

Read full topic
